channel.title: Black Friday deals for folk like us?
channel.description:
I'm sick of going on about VAT so my email this week will contain all the Black Friday Deals I can find that are relevant to small businesses.
So, if you have a deal or have spotted one let me know. I'll send it out tomorrow.
You can sign up to my weekly email for entrepreneurs here http://rachelandrew.co.uk/list

item.title: Black Friday deals for folk like us?
item.dc:creator: fredrivett
item.description:
Oh yeah and I just saw that Product Hunt have a whole list dedicated to Black Friday. Should be able to find some interesting ones on there.

Product Hunt

Startup Black Friday | Product Hunt

Fantastic tools and services for startups, discounted for product hunters. Discover 22 curated products like Intercom and Slack about Startup Black Friday followed by 36 followers
